snippet: The British veteran rider David Millar of Garmin-Sharp won Friday’s stage as the rising star Tejay van Garderen continued his stellar support of Cadel Evans in the mountains.
abstract: British veteran rider David Millar wins stage 12 of the Tour de France; American rising star Tejay van Garderen continues his stellar support of BMC Racing teammate Cadel Evans in the mountains.
lead_paragraph: The British veteran rider David Millar of Garmin-Sharp won Friday’s stage as the rising star Tejay van Garderen continued his stellar support of Cadel Evans in the mountains.

headline.seo: 2012 Tour de France — Van Garderen, the Young Star Dressed in White
headline.main: Star in White Jersey Plays a Supporting Role, Too
